The goal is to win a certain number of tricks
A science fiction strategy game
Players develop technology and colonize planets
The game features a tech tree
A chaotic game about building a spaceship
Players build their ship in real-time
The ship then flies through space and encounters dangers
A cooperative trick-taking card game
Players are astronauts on a mission
The game is played in rounds
A game about escaping from an island
Players try to get their meeples to safety
The island is sinking
